aa431c76-9847-4817-8676-b3b9bdbe7413.description: This badge represents that user participated in a course for Laser Cutter and was instructed about what materials can be used, what is a laser cutter and how it works, what can be done and what can not be done. Also how to prepare the files and how to use the program “Adobe Illustrator” for laser cutting. Info about rules, etc.

7438b165-3d50-4804-8b93-a2847c2102fd.description: This badge represents that user knows how to work with a 3D Printer: about the 3D-print concept, additive manufacturing, Ultimaker 2+ Single Extruder, how to change the filament and how to calibrate the print area, how to prepare the files and how to use the program “CURA” for printing. Info about rules, etc
7438b165-3d50-4804-8b93-a2847c2102fd.name: *3D Print

2fdca9be-8078-462f-a592-79c181381422.description: The Ready for Print skill entails knowing how to prepare graphic design in Adobe InDesign, Illustrator or Acrobat so it is ready to be printed as offset or digital printing as well as getting an offer for printing using the correct wording.
2fdca9be-8078-462f-a592-79c181381422.name: Ready for Print

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: Create an Indesign document with up to 8 pages. Any paper format is accepted.Include CMYK images. InDesign document uses Paragraph styles. It is in CMYK Images have the resolution of 150 DPI or higher Export a pdf file in press quality, which is issued with registration marks and crop marks Every design element which outreaches the border of the paper is supplied with at least 3 mm of bleed The naming of the file is relevant

a32d8213-9b72-4f65-86e2-8829c32b8d5a.description: Studiemakker på tværs - Master indebærer, at den studerende har deltaget aktivt i de planlagte aktiviteter og refleksionsopgaver, som er en del af Studiemakker på Tværs. Ved at give og modtage feedback har den studerende trænet sine employability skills - f.eks. sociale kompetencer samt kritisk tænkning. Den studerende har også reflekteret over sit eget arbejde og egne arbejdsmetoder. Master badget tildeles studerende på 3.semester.
a32d8213-9b72-4f65-86e2-8829c32b8d5a.name: Studiemakker - Master

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: Studerende har deltaget i minimum 3 af 4 planlagte møder og har dokumenteret personlig og faglig læring i eget procesportfolio. I procesportfolio er der beskrevet, hvordan den studerende har udviklet sine personlige kompetencer og egenskaber gennem forløbet Studiemakker på tværs. Alle møder er desuden dokumenteret i procesportfolio.

d1865e53-5246-4fa6-ad57-f454d235d457.description: Students who have received the badge “Study Partner - Master'', have actively participated in planned activities and reflection tasks, as a part of the intercurricular initiative “Study partner across semesters”. By giving and receiving feedback, the student trained employability skills such as social skills and critical thinking, and reflecting upon one's own work and methods. The Master badge is awarded 3rd semester students.
d1865e53-5246-4fa6-ad57-f454d235d457.name: Study Partner - Master

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: The student has participated in a minimum of 3 of the 4 planned meetings and documented personal and professional learning in a personal process portfolio. The process portfolio describes how the student has developed personal competencies and qualities through the course “Study Partner Across Semesters”. All meetings are also documented in the process portfolio.

e58a6589-e256-499a-96e0-234576e39d1d.description: Studiemakker - Apprentice indebærer, at den studerende har deltaget aktivt i de planlagte aktiviteter og refleksionsopgaver i forløbet Studiemakker på Tværs. Den studerende har trænet sine employability skills. Det er blandt andet sociale kompetencer samt kritisk tænkning ved bl.a. at give og modtage feedback, og reflektere over sit eget arbejde og egne arbejdsmetoder. Apprentice badge tildeles studerende på 1. semester.
e58a6589-e256-499a-96e0-234576e39d1d.name: Studiemakker - Apprentice

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: Studerende har deltaget i minimum 3 af 4 planlagte møder, og har dokumenteret personlig og faglig læring i eget procesportfolio. I procesportfolio er det beskrevet, hvordan den studerende har udviklet sine personlige kompetencer og egenskaber gennem forløbet Studiemakker på tværs. Alle møder er desuden dokumenteret i procesportfolio.

12a6d5ad-7402-4b58-86aa-8a3f6a52bf12.description: Students receiving the badge “Study Partner - Apprentice'', have actively participated in planned activities and reflection tasks, as a part of the intercurricular initiative “Study Partner Across Semesters”. Through giving and receiving feedback students trained employability skills such as social skills, and critical thinking, and reflecting upon one's own work and methods. The Apprentice badge is awarded to 1st semester students.
12a6d5ad-7402-4b58-86aa-8a3f6a52bf12.name: Study Partner - Apprentice

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: The student participated in a minimum of 3 of the 4 planned meetings and has documented personal and professional learning in a personal process portfolio. The process portfolio,describes how the student developed personal competencies and qualities through the course “Study Partner Across Semesters”. All meetings are documented in the process portfolio.

d3114048-b1e7-4087-b94d-35c298554561.description: When finishing this course, the student has obtained knowledge about the basics of WordPress. Which means they are able to interfere with menus, submenus and know the back-end of WordPress. Furthermore, the student has established an acquaintance about several plugins within WordPress. Besides, the student has obtained general knowledge about how to install and interact with WordPress. They have received knowledge on how to change themes and gotten examples of good web design.
d3114048-b1e7-4087-b94d-35c298554561.name: WordPress

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: The student was introduced to SEO and SEO plugins. In addition, the student has obtained knowledge about social media integration into WordPress. The student has received lectures in the process of making WordPress more smooth and user-friendly. Furthermore, the student has learned the very basics of integrating Google Analytics in WordPress.

d04744e0-0adb-454a-91b9-a6f0f74ba2d6.description: The student who attended the Social Media course gets the following badge. When finishing this course, the student has been introduced to the essential skills, so the student is able to use Facebook professionally – on a practical level.
d04744e0-0adb-454a-91b9-a6f0f74ba2d6.name: Social Media Course

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: The student has been introduced to Facebook ads and received knowledge about how to analyze ads on a professional level. Furthermore, the student has learned how to create audiences and received an insight into the audiences. The student was likewise introduced to the difference between Business Manager vs. Personal Ad Account. The student has obtained knowledge of how to use Facebook for not only personal use but also for marketing purposes.

1e7bd530-a0f3-4857-9e8f-2b2b9cf92687.description: Deltageren har modtaget oplæg om følgende: 1) Forstår det grundlæggende i XR -teknologier, der bruges i XR Lab (VR + AR + MR). 2) Har viden om, hvordan man brugen af forskellige VR-headsets i rapid-prototyping. 3) Har kendskab til og praktisk brug af rapid-prototype værktøjerne CoSpaces Edu og TinkerCad til VR- og AR-udvikling. 4) Har viden om, brugen af hurtige prototyper til at bygge 3D-objekter 5) Har viden om, brugen af et mobilt 3D-scanningsværktøj i VR/AR -udvikling
1e7bd530-a0f3-4857-9e8f-2b2b9cf92687.name: XR Lab prototyping 1

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: Introduktion til XR teknologier og XR Lab udstyr. 1) Fokus på at forstå de grundlæggende XR -teknologier, der bruges i XR Lab herunder VR, AR og MR). 2) Hands on aktiviteter, som giver viden om, hvordan man bruger forskellige VR-headsets, der udvikling af XR-prototyper.

Introduktion til rapid prototyping med VR & AR tools. 1) Kendskab til og praktisk brug af rapid prototyping software til VR- og AR -udviklingsprojekter med fokus på CoSpaces Edu og TinkerCad. 2) Hands on viden om, hvordan man bruger rapid prototyping software til at bygge 3D-objekter målrettet VR og AR applikationer. 3) Færdigheder til at producere grundlæggende VR/AR -applikation ved hjælp af hurtige prototypeværktøjer, der er synlige på VR-headsets og smartphones/tablets
Gennemgang af 3D scanner værktøj. 1) Viden om, og færdigheder i brugen af et mobilt 3D-scanningsværktøj som 3D-scanner til VR/AR applikationer. 2) Viden om 3D scanne procedurer og formater.

ca62d32d-d690-4dc7-9fe2-bc91170211d3.description: The student who attended the Adobe Photoshop course has received lectures on the following topics: Understanding the basics of Photoshop including interface, Using different layers and selections, Advanced retouching including painting with brushes, Building images from parts, Color grading and know the correct resolution.
ca62d32d-d690-4dc7-9fe2-bc91170211d3.name: Photoshop

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: After finishing this course, the student has received knowledge of Photoshop and information about how to implement multiple useful tools. The student has received lectures in incorporate layers and confidently use channels panels. Furthermore, the student has been educated in different ways of making selections, to prove and display, how each selection has different benefits and costs. In order to individually create different layers and filters, the student has learned the modes and transforms

3acb891d-8978-4fba-9041-cab15284d878.description: CRISIIS is the acronym “Connecting and Reflecting In Student International Interactive Study-groups”. In CRISIIS students collaborate with international students on crisis as a topic in an online setting. Through this experimental learning, students gain a deeper understanding of cultural differences in a health care perspective while improve their collaborations and linguistic skills.
3acb891d-8978-4fba-9041-cab15284d878.name: Virtual Exchange - CRISIIS

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: The student identifies and reflects on a family crisis, and describes this crisis in writing on 1-2 pages in English. The students also meet online in assigned groups with international students for presentation and planning of the next meetings. This activity develops and trains both oral and written communication skills in English and also develop collaboration skills using online communication platforms.

The students present their own crisis with which they are familiar. After all four students has presented their crisis, the group will come to an agreement on which subject they will work with in a national and international perspective. This activity trains linguistic and communication skills in English and enhance students collaboration skills.

Based on the findings in literature, articles, guidelines and other relevant information students will present, discuss and reflect on their findings and come away with a deeper understanding on how the healthcare systems and society deals with the subject. Afterwards the group will develop a joint professional presentation. This activity develops and trains both oral and written communication skills in English and also develop collaboration skills.

0290dadf-f663-401d-a4b9-26d84f714725.description: This course examines how digital tools are revolutionizing the world of marketing by shifting the balance of power from firms to consumers. This elective course is part of the INNOVATION AND ENTREPRENEURSHIP offered by UCL.
0290dadf-f663-401d-a4b9-26d84f714725.name: Digital Marketing

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: The student who attended the Digital Marketing elective course gets the following badge, which shows they received extensive knowledge within: Marketing Tools: SoMe and SEO, Google Ads + Bing, Wordpress setup and user reviews. Also knowledge in Consumer behavior, Bing ads, Marketing Content, Hotjar & Coffee Shop test, Eye tracker (NeuroMarketing), Data Analytics, Big data, AI and bots

e98e4a11-870d-4070-a6d9-de867cd90445.description: Provides a thorough grounding in page layout skills using Adobe InDesign. Delegates build knowledge and confidence using InDesign's key features, learning how to create effective page layouts quickly.
e98e4a11-870d-4070-a6d9-de867cd90445.name: Adobe InDesign

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: During this course, the student has been introduced to do page layout, such as a newspaper or creating a new curriculum vitae... The attending student has been informed on how to menus and function. During the course, the student has gained general knowledge in structural design and color theory. The course final project was a new C.V. layout.

84ff08a6-db75-429a-823e-ffe0f069d6b5.description: The badge confirms that the person has ability to understand the basics of an email marketing.
84ff08a6-db75-429a-823e-ffe0f069d6b5.name: Email Marketing

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: The badge confirms that the person has ability to understand the basics of an email marketing:  Create a newsletter and a lead magnet, Make an email automation, Build a list of subscribers, Create a strong campaign/engagement series, Strategically sell to the subscribers.

bfa25eba-7381-4248-ab1a-ef72bd9a418a.description: Modtageren af UCL’s kompetence badge har fuldført niveau 5 i UCL’s e-kompetencereol med en afsluttende score på 80% eller derover. E- læringsforløbet er et selvstudie med fokus på udvikling af it-didaktiske kompetence, teknisk handleviden og teknologiforståelse. Jf. niveau 5 har modtager af dette badge, det grundlæggende fundament til at handle intuitivt (tavs viden) didaktisk og teknologisk, samt færdigheder og kompetencer til at udvikle nye og innovative digitale undervisningsformater.
bfa25eba-7381-4248-ab1a-ef72bd9a418a.name: Google Workspace

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: For at få tildelt dette badge, er det et krav, at du gennemfører det tilhørende læringsobjekt fra kompetencereolen fra UCL og består med en score på minimum 80%. Gennemførsel giver viden, færdigheder og kompetencer inden for didaktisk og teknisk anvendelsen af Googles programmer

skills.name: Google Cloud Platform And G Suite

e6c975d9-f05c-4479-9294-6f115556d13b.description: The badge has been issues for the ability to choose the right font for the right context. Was the goal of the choice of font to “shout” and draw attention to itself, or should it add a subtle, almost anonymous touch of elegance? This is eThe badge recipient has chosen an existing film for which he or she has designed a poster - or invented a new one and uploaded a pdf to a specified submission folder. The pdf of the movie poster is evaluated according to knowledge of genre and typographic style.
e6c975d9-f05c-4479-9294-6f115556d13b.name: Selecting type

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: To receive the badge has entailed independently designing a typographic film poster within one of three genres of films: Horror, Romantic Comedy or Drama.
To receive the badge entailed explaining the font choices using the correct typographic language in a separate textfile.

99d9e143-0c77-48b6-a1d5-852cae463488.description: Modtageren af UCL’s kompetence badge har fuldført niveau 5 i UCL’s e-kompetencereol med en afsluttende score på 80% eller derover. E- læringsforløbet er et selvstudie med fokus på udvikling af it-didaktiske kompetence, teknisk handleviden og teknologiforståelse. Jf. niveau 5 har modtager af dette badge, det grundlæggende fundament til at handle intuitivt (tavs viden) didaktisk og teknologisk, samt færdigheder og kompetencer til at udvikle nye og innovative digitale undervisningsformater.
99d9e143-0c77-48b6-a1d5-852cae463488.name: itslearning 2.0 - ©KompetenceReolen

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: For at få tildelt dette badge, er det et krav, at du gennemfører det tilhørende læringsobjekt fra kompetence reolen fra UCL og består med en score på minimum 80%. Gennemførsel giver viden, færdigheder og kompetencer inden for didaktisk og teknisk anvendelsen af Itslearning

3915475a-99d6-472a-a8df-341a49025878.description: The elective course has as a goal to empower the students with knowledge of using the equipment in the Fablab so they can expand their possibilities in prototyping the idea. This elective course is part of the INNOVATION AND ENTREPRENEURSHIP offered by UCL.
3915475a-99d6-472a-a8df-341a49025878.name: Advanced Maker Skills

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: The student who attended the Advanced Maker Skills elective course gets the following badge, which shows they received extensive knowledge within: 3D printing, Laser cutter usage, Vinyl Cutter usage. Also, the student learns how to use digital software like Adobe Illustrator for sketching and introduction to maker culture.

a6e12329-1cdf-4f89-b65f-13df01bc3905.description: Studiemakker - Employability tildeles den studerende der har ydet en særlig indsats i forløbet Studiemakker på Tværs, og dermed yderligere forbedret sine personlige kompetencer og højnet employability. Denne badge kan søges på 3.semester. Den studerende udvælges på baggrund af en motiveret ansøgning eller en indstilling fra medstuderende. Udvælgelsen foretages af undervisere på uddannelsen.
a6e12329-1cdf-4f89-b65f-13df01bc3905.name: Studiemakker - Employability

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: Kriterier: 1) Den studerende redegør for hvilken læring vedkommende har opnået i forhold til personlige kompetencer. 2) Den studerende har bidraget med at skabe sociale aktiviteter, som inkluderer alle semestre på uddannelsen. 3) Den studerende har bidraget med at skabe faglige aktiviteter, som inkluderer alle semestre på uddannelsen. 4) Den studerende skal have opnået badgen “Studiemakker - Master.”

Udover opfyldelse af kriterierne for badget, at den studerende desuden: 1) Assisteret underviserne med planlægning og opretholdelse af Studiemakker på Tværs som studiemakker-hjælper. 2) Fungeret som “ambassadør” for forløbet og studiet over for medstuderende, organisationen og potentielle studerende. 3) Bidraget positivt til videreudvikling af Studiemakker på Tværs-konceptet

1b0ca943-0db3-48dc-977b-4c497947ac59.description: The badge “Study partner - Employability” is awarded to students who made a special effort in the intercurricular initiative “Study Partner Across Semesters”, and thus further improved personal competencies and employability skills. This badge is awarded to 3rd semester students. The student can apply to receive this badge on the basis of a motivated application or a written recommendation from fellow students. The applications for this badge are evaluated by teachers on the program.
1b0ca943-0db3-48dc-977b-4c497947ac59.name: Study Partner - Employability

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: Criteria: 1) The student explains the learning in relation to personal competencies. 2) The student helped to create social activities, for all semesters in the program. 3) The student helped to create academic activities for all semesters of the program. 4) The student have been awarded with the badge “Study Partner - Master”.

In addition, the student has also met one or more of the following criteria: 1) Assisted with planning and maintenance of the "Study Partner Across Semesters" initiative. 2) “Ambassador" for the education and the initiative to fellow students, organization and potential students. 3) Contributed to the further development of the "Study Partner Across Semesters" concept.

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: Rise

f62ce6be-89ce-44a7-9d47-57083f05d463.description: Modtageren af UCL’s kompetence badge har fuldført niveau 5 i UCL’s e-kompetencereol med en afsluttende score på 80% eller derover. E- læringsforløbet er et selvstudie med fokus på udvikling af it-didaktiske kompetence, teknisk handleviden og teknologiforståelse. Jf. niveau 5 har modtager af dette badge, det grundlæggende fundament til at handle intuitivt (tavs viden) didaktisk og teknologisk, samt færdigheder og kompetencer til at udvikle nye og innovative digitale undervisningsformater.
f62ce6be-89ce-44a7-9d47-57083f05d463.name: Office 365

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: For at få tildelt dette badge, er det et krav, at du gennemfører det tilhørende læringsobjekt fra kompetencereolen fra UCL og består med en score på minimum 80%. Gennemførsel giver viden, færdigheder og kompetencer inden for didaktisk og teknisk anvendelsen af Office 365

8bf96a1e-610b-4981-953e-34a2dfc137a9.description: Dette badge er bevis for, at en studerende eller ansat på UCL har bestået UCLs online GDPR kursus.
8bf96a1e-610b-4981-953e-34a2dfc137a9.name: GDPR UCL Erhvervsakademi og professionshøjskole

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: Der er gennemført et grundlæggende kursus med fokus på GDPR reglerne og korrekt behandling af personoplysninger.

8e68fb97-e06a-4250-b30f-b4fa33284ed3.description: Badget er givet for færdigheden til at vælge den rette skrifttype til den rette kontekst. Skal skrifttypen “råbe” og gøre opmærksom på sig selv, eller skal den tilføje et subtilt næsten anonymt strejf af elegance? Dette kommer til udtryk gennem skrifttypens skriftsnit, kondensering, hældning, krumning, orientering eller stil, samt gennem viden om dens historie.
8e68fb97-e06a-4250-b30f-b4fa33284ed3.name: Valg af skrifttype

issuer.summary: issued by UCL - Erhvervsakademi og Professionshøjskole

badge_template_activities.title: Aktivitet 1 for at modtage badget har drejet sig om selvstændigt at udforme en typografisk filmplakat inden for én af tre genrer af film: Horror, Romantisk komedie eller Drama. Badgemodtageren har selv valgt en eksisterende film, som vedkommende har udformet en plakat til - eller opfundet en ny og uploadet en pdf til en angiven afleveringsmappe. Pdf'en af filmplakaten er evalueret efter viden om genre og typografisk stil.
Opgave 2 for at modtage badget har drejet sig om at redegør for sine valg af skrifttyper til filmplakaten og bruger det korrekte typografiske sprog til at beskrive valgene i en separat tekstfil.
